title: [Campus Asia] 교환학생 지원 (Tsinghua Fall ＆ Tokyo Tech Fall) by April 15
content: Dear all CS upper-level undergrads: The participants of the ToKyo Tech summer program will soon be announced. We now solicit applications for the Fall 2012 exchange for Tsinghua Univ. and Tokyo Institute of Tech. Ambitious students are requested to fill out the attached form and submit by email to Prof. Hyun, Soon Jooat sjhyun@kaist.ac.kr BY THIS WEEKEND, April 14. Prof. Hyun, Soon Joo 현순주 P.S. - Summer program is not offered at Tsinghua University this year. - So, those who applied for Tsinghua Summer & Fall and Tokyo Tech Fall program will need to re-submit their applications.
